author: James Joyce
text: Dear Larbaud: I am nearly dead with work and eyes. Sent Penelope to the printers so that you may have it to read when you come here. All will be ready for you on the 2 October. The Ithaca episode I shall put in order in October. When does your article appear in N.R.F.? A man called for the chair but not about the mirror. You will scarcely recognise parts of Ulysses I have worked so much on them. Una stretta di mano James Joyce
